body: Some humans are uniquely skilled at maximizing their natural gifts. These humans pick two ability scores and gain a +2 racial bonus in each of those scores. This racial trait replaces the +2 bonus to any one ability score, the bonus feat, and the skilled traits.
name: Dual Talent
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Humans/Alternate Racial Rules/Alternate Racial Traits/Dual Talent
